pullrequest.title: Require DART 4.1 and fix deprecation warnings

content.raw: I just updated the gazebo-any-dart4 job to use the gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64 script; it was previously using the gazebo-default-gui-test-devel-trusty-amd64 script, which didn't have dart4 enabled (see [release-tools commit](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/commits/6df2c32b334fcee4ff241d7767bb276755bce905?at=dart4)). I also had to remove a few lines from that script ([release-tools 3d7c194](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/commits/3d7c194)). Running [one more time](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_dart4-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/19/console)...
content.html: I just updated the gazebo-any-dart4 job to use the gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64 script; it was previously using the gazebo-default-gui-test-devel-trusty-amd64 script, which didn't have dart4 enabled (see release-tools commit). I also had to remove a few lines from that script (release-tools 3d7c194). Running one more time...
